text: Jeffries: House stopgap bill ‘total defeat for the extreme MAGA Republicans’  —  House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries (D-N.Y.) on Saturday hailed Democratic efforts in passing a short-term bill to fund the government, calling it a “defeat” for “MAGA Republicans.”
